alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 3:28PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN IBERIA... SOUTHEASTERN LAFAYETTE AND WEST CENTRAL ST. MARTIN PARISHES THROUGH 400 PM CDT... At 328 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Martinville, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, St. Martinville, Broussard, Youngsville, Delcambre, Loreauville, Cade, Coteau, Acadiana Regional Airport, Jefferson Island, and Parks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin
